summary: Client (alex) requested that helloworld be changed to output "testing 123"; the developer executed change request req_1760977803402 and updated helloworld.py. Architect, PM, and QA did not provide comments or reviews during this change.

decisions.title: Change request executed
decisions.details: Client requested change to helloworld output; developer executed change request req_1760977803402 and updated helloworld.py to output 'testing 123'.

sign_offs.what: Executed change request req_1760977803402 and updated helloworld.py

actions.task: Execute requested change to helloworld.py to output 'testing 123' (req_1760977803402)
Perform verification and regression tests on updated helloworld.py to confirm output and absence of regressions

risks.risk: Change deployed without explicit review from Architect, PM, or QA which may introduce regressions or missed requirements.
risks.mitigation: Schedule quick post-deploy review and run QA regression tests; revert or patch if issues are found.
